entries.description: Amazon Q: Updated `/help` command to include re:invent 2024 features
Amazon Q: UI improvements through more accurate code syntax highlighting
Fixed an issue where Amazon Q settings did not persist across IDE restarts
Amazon Q: Fix context menu displaying when typing `@`, even though input is disallowed
Amazon Q: Fix up/down history navigation only triggering on first/last line of prompt input
Amazon Q /doc: Ask for user prompt if error occurs while updating documentation
Amazon Q: cursor no longer jumps after navigating prompt history
Improve text description of workspace index settings
Amazon Q /doc: fix for user prompt to change folder in chat
Amazon Q Doc README diff will re-open when the README file is clicked after it has been closed
Amazon Q /test: Fix for test generation payload creation to not filter out target file.
Amazon Q: word duplication when pressing tab on context selector fixed
